vote.text: Amendment SA 3392 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3392 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Udall. (consideration: CR S4807; text: CR S4807) To improve the bill.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3392 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Udall.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3392 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
